description: Base-5 digits are, in order, the first n terms of the periodic sequence with initial period 1,1,0.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,0,1,-5).
example: The first six terms have base 5 representations 1, 11, 110, 1101, 11011, 110110.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
